examples.example: 人生路上会遇到一些困难，不过只要我们保持乐观积极的心态，就一定能克服它们。

translate.english: There will be some difficulties on the road of life, but as long as we keep an optimistic and positive attitude, we will surely be able to overcome them.

examples.example: 生活中难免会有挫折，不过我们要相信阳光总在风雨后。

translate.english: There will inevitably be setbacks in life, but we should believe that the sunshine always comes after the storm.

examples.example: 无论遇到什么挑战，我们都要勇敢面对，不过也不要忘记给自己留一些放松的时间。

translate.english: No matter what challenges we encounter, we should face them bravely, but also don't forget to leave some relaxing time for ourselves.
